mCrvpGhuam16kPv-9.name: Absorptive Change
mCrvpGhuam16kPv-9.notes: @Level of Absorptive Change. 1 None, 2, Light, 3, Medium, 4, Heavy, 5, Extra Heavy@

mjh69dwXSU1R0MR-9.name: Frequency: Constantly
mjh69dwXSU1R0MR-9.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

mrptAi-OQEEqoZQfX.name: Frequency: Hourly
mrptAi-OQEEqoZQfX.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

mhNBQVjFkfZWJ6_d_.name: Frequency: Daily
mhNBQVjFkfZWJ6_d_.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

mhN7Qx42GmynE7s0j.name: Frequency: Weekly
mhN7Qx42GmynE7s0j.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

mNPfpRmzLI_zc2Am9.name: Frequency: Monthly
mNPfpRmzLI_zc2Am9.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

m5euHHhwMzdowwlJc.name: Frequency: Seasonally
m5euHHhwMzdowwlJc.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

mF46YMbNRdaf-ecaF.name: Frequency: Yearly
mF46YMbNRdaf-ecaF.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

mwo-jXSuJXJUGSiOq.name: Aging
mwo-jXSuJXJUGSiOq.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency

mcaBkuUJPhcUunDQF.name: Major
mcaBkuUJPhcUunDQF.notes: Cannot enter dwelling for the first time unless invited

mqTAaWi5jrNWvDHTh.name: Oxygen Storage
mqTAaWi5jrNWvDHTh.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

maxdQoEgUEHhnAudU.name: Oxygen Storage
maxdQoEgUEHhnAudU.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mOiqPdrFBfN9Nd2c4.name: Oxygen Storage
mOiqPdrFBfN9Nd2c4.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

m32mOIXB76MWDvL_f.name: Oxygen Storage
m32mOIXB76MWDvL_f.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mDnFSp9u7tfBar7RZ.name: Oxygen Storage
mDnFSp9u7tfBar7RZ.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

tVsPfy2vPWB91XIDL.name: Dread
tVsPfy2vPWB91XIDL.notes: May not come within level yards of Running water

tlPKvMCasusMnAxmy.name: Dread
tlPKvMCasusMnAxmy.notes: May not come within level yards of Garlic

tcXbgTVWtu8-zuAT2.name: Dread
tcXbgTVWtu8-zuAT2.notes: May not come within level yards of Religious Symbols

m3u27RuxCYFW56U0M.name: Diffuse
m3u27RuxCYFW56U0M.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mXLKiYHKoYHJH7hAG.name: Homogenous
mXLKiYHKoYHJH7hAG.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

m8Por0j-EGeQzd7Q4.name: No Blood
m8Por0j-EGeQzd7Q4.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

miS3YJBUZ0GdoKjc0.name: No Brain
miS3YJBUZ0GdoKjc0.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

mixuTb_3tXapaREd-.name: No Eyes
mixuTb_3tXapaREd-.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mnjnymw7x0uh49n-d.name: No Head
mnjnymw7x0uh49n-d.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mhNtfKg0-EA3IKeaY.name: No Neck
mhNtfKg0-EA3IKeaY.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mZd0AUYAPDleAA2EV.name: No Vitals
mZd0AUYAPDleAA2EV.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mvzCtEeJ4LSOmozU9.name: Unliving
mvzCtEeJ4LSOmozU9.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mRSpEu7ccH9NW1ISL.name: Partial Change
mRSpEu7ccH9NW1ISL.notes: Can turn an item you are carrying substantial without dropping it

mj_6VEwPHZi8xxHcY.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

msQNnTxqBeqIuVDQY.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

m3EOcHcXPr0y_4SuO.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

mltEL_LH-1659m4BV.name: No Body Heat
mltEL_LH-1659m4BV.notes: Gives +1 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from those who touch you, shake your hand, kiss you, etc.

mHBnsoUwlTEgQZWft.name: No Body Heat
mHBnsoUwlTEgQZWft.notes: Can gain warmth temporarily, such as after feeding for a vampire. Gives +1 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from those who touch you, shake your hand, kiss you, etc.

mpeQk8yLVBnntIfx5.name: No Reflection
mpeQk8yLVBnntIfx5.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who notice you have no reflection

mrfi-CBB2DvNQASv1.name: No Shadow
mrfi-CBB2DvNQASv1.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others that notice you have no shadow

mxt8jH4HBobMzhPiS.name: Pallor
mxt8jH4HBobMzhPiS.notes: Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who can see you without makeup in good light

m6rgjvTraWm8gwItM.name: Pallor
m6rgjvTraWm8gwItM.notes: Can gain the flush of life temporarily, such as after feeding for a vampire. Gives +2 on all rolls to deduce your secret

features.situation: from others who can see you without makeup in good light

tzikqGlEDVvkjACob.name: Vampiric Bite
tzikqGlEDVvkjACob.notes: Drains 1 HP + 1/level per second. For every 3 HP stolen, you heal 1 HP or 1 FP (your choice). Also lets you bite in combat without feeding. Add Teeth (Sharp Teeth) or Teeth (Sharp Beak) – your choice for free.
